name: Fractal Gallery VR
description:
A cozy place in which you can relax from everyday life looking at the beauty of mathematics.What's inside- 100 static images of fractals.
- 30 dynamic images of fractals.
- Hidden secrets.
- Meditative soundtrack.

The gallery is constantly changing, so you can always find something new.

Let the Fractal Gallery become a part of your VR-universe.Support and updatesI plan to actively support this project after launch. There are some interesting ideas that I plan to implement. Also over time, I plan to add new content: new fractals, environmental details, objects, and hidden secrets.
The project is based on UE4. Therefore, I plan to add support for new VR devices and improve the graphics.
